column1: Artyomovsky District (Russian: Артёмовский райо́н) is an administrative district (raion)
column2: one of the thirty in Sverdlovsk Oblast
column4: it is incorporated as Artyomovsky Urban Okrug. Its administrative center is the town of Artyomovsky. Population (excluding the administrative center): 27
